name: JACKPOT 3
description:
JACKPOT 3 is a casual game. Before starting the game, you need to bet first. After the bet, the small ball will start to turn again. When the small ball stops on a certain number, that number is the winning number.
[Game operation]
Click to operate.
[Game features]
There are many ways to bet in the game, for example, you can bet a single number, you can bet multiple numbers, or you can bet red or black.
Different betting methods have different odds.
The money used in the game is game currency, which is purely entertainment, not gambling. Players will receive certain game coins every day when they enter the game.
